column4: Hey guys I'm looking for a way to change the Artist in the id3 tag of multiple mp3s at once. Tried Easytag 2.1.6 but it seems it only allows editing one file at a time. Anyone know a tool?
I use mp3tag (a Windows program) under WINE
There are ways to script it
I'm no good at scripting - I use Ubuntu since yesterday :)
Is mp3tag easy to install under wine?
You might find that works well for you
I tried the same with teamviewer. It installs successfully but aferwards can't be started and isn't in wine's c:/programs/ oO
Any idea what might be going on?
Some programs simply don't work.  I have never used that one, sorry

actually, it does work, even without installation. I am just confused about it installing correctly but then not showing in c:. Anyways, I'll try mp3 tag now, hopefully you're still here if something goes wrong :(
It says there's an update available. Can I simply download & install it from within the program?
I've never tried that, it might work!
mp3tag works great, does exactly what I wanted - Thanks a lot :)
